QuestData.Title: A Simple Sacrifice
QuestData.Description:
You must hurry! Lord Autumnvale brought Edwin off to that cave right when he returned, saying something about "an offering of blood!"
I think they mean to sacrifice him to appease the Wicker Man!
Just what kind of crazy cult is this?!
QuestData.LogDescription: Rescue Edwin Maldus from the Wickerite cultists in Autumnvale.
QuestData.RewardText:
Those cultists tried to kill me!
I don't know about you, but I've had about enough of this Wicker Man business!
